WolfBlade::
She noticed that this Windlord seemed uneasy. She tried another 
approach. "Uh, OK. Sure. But, may I ask a question? Why do you act as 
if you have never heard of us? I mean, did somethng disasterous 
happen to erase everyone's memory banks or something?" she said in a 
soft and dulcit tone. 


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord:
> 
> "We all had a haard day, ma'am"said kindly windlord"we should rest, 
> and repair the base asoon as posible"
